text: Max Carver (born Robert Maxwell Martensen Jr;California Birth Index 1905-1995, Ancestry.com August 1, 1988) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Preston Scavo in the ABC television series Desperate Housewives,Interview with Charlie and Max Carver and as Aiden on the MTV teen-horror drama Teen Wolf. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:Twin people from the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Max Carver
